markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Expert Disassembler](/Feats.aspx?ID=2061) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 190 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Scrounger](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=75)

**Prerequisites**
Master in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4); [Scrounger Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2058)

</column>

---

You can apply the same techniques you use to reverse engineer objects to disable them. You can use [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) instead of [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) to [Disable a Device](/Actions.aspx?ID=69) or [Pick a Lock](/Actions.aspx?ID=70).
name: Expert Disassembler
